translation.description: Your one-stop interface to explore data-driven insights and analytics on all areas of the public sector, powered by the data made open on this site.
translation.description_agency: Your one-stop interface to explore data-driven insights and analytics on the core work of {{ agency }}, powered by the data they make open on this site.

emergency-response.name: Emergency Response
emergency-response.description: Real-time data for efficient emergency management.

blood-donation.name: Blood Donation
blood-donation.description: Daily blood donation activity and blood stock sufficiency, with breakdowns by key demographics.

car-popularity.name: Car Popularity Explorer
car-popularity.description: Car model popularity and vehicle registration trends.

circle-of-life.name: The Circle of Life
circle-of-life.description: Insights on various life stages and events.

civil-service.name: The Civil Service
civil-service.description: Information on government employment and services.

consumer-prices.name: Consumer Prices
consumer-prices.description: Monthly CPI inflation at national and state level, covering headline CPI, core CPI, and CPI by category.

covid-19.name: COVID-19
covid-19.description: Weekly surveillance of COVID-19 in Malaysia at state level, covering cases, hospitalisations, and deaths.

crime.name: Crime
crime.description: Visualize crime data and patterns for safer communities.

currency-in-circulation.name: Currency in Circulation
currency-in-circulation.description: Track currency flow and circulation trends.

drug-addiction.name: Drug Addiction
drug-addiction.description: Track drug and substance abuses cases in Malaysia.

election-explorer.name: Election Explorer
election-explorer.description: A complete history of Malaysian elections; 1955 to 2023.

exchange-rates.name: Exchange Rates
exchange-rates.description: Exchange rate of the MYR against currencies of 24 major trading partners, including USA, China, UK, and Singapore.

fire-and-rescue.name: Fire and Rescue
fire-and-rescue.description: Real-time data for efficient fire and rescue operations.

flood-warning.name: Flood Warning
flood-warning.description: Receive timely alerts and information about floods.

gdp.name: Gross Domestic Product (GDP)
gdp.description: Quarterly economic growth, covering real and nominal GDP by expenditure and economic activity.

government-site-tracker.name: Government Site Tracker
government-site-tracker.description: Monitor government website performance and availability.

hospital-bed-utilisation.name: Hospital Bed Utilisation
hospital-bed-utilisation.description: Hospital-level bed utilisation data, covering utilisation for critical and non-critical care beds on a daily basis.

immigration.name: Immigration
immigration.description: Foreign arrivals in Malaysia by nationality.

income-taxation.name: Income Taxation
income-taxation.description: Compare yourself against other Malaysian taxpayers!

interest-rates.name: Interest Rates
interest-rates.description: Monitor and analyze interest rate fluctuations.

international-reserves.name: International Reserves
international-reserves.description: Bird's eye view of international reserve sufficiency.

internet-penetration.name: Internet Penetration
internet-penetration.description: Measure and analyze internet usage rates.

money-supply.name: Money Supply
money-supply.description: Track and analyze money supply trends.

organ-donation.name: Organ Donation
organ-donation.description: Daily organ donation pledges and nationwide pledger rates, with breakdowns by key demographics.

peka-b40.name: Peka B40
peka-b40.description: Daily screenings under the PeKA B40 program, including screening rates for the target population across the country.

ipr.name: The People's Income Initiative (IPR)
ipr.description: Track and analyze the impact of the People's Income Initiative.

passport-and-passes.name: Passport and Passes
passport-and-passes.description: Find out how many passports issued to Malaysians and visas for visiting foreigners.

poverty.name: Poverty
poverty.description: Insights and data on poverty rates and alleviation efforts.

public-contracting.name: Public Contracting
public-contracting.description: Monitor and ensure transparency in public contracting processes.

public-pension.name: Public Pensions
public-pension.description: Information and updates on public pension schemes and benefits.

public-transportation.name: Public Transportation
public-transportation.description: Ridership data from all main services.

reserve-money.name: Reserve Money
reserve-money.description: Track and analyze reserve money levels and trends.

retirement-readiness.name: Retirement Readiness
retirement-readiness.description: Assess and plan for a financially secure retirement.

sekolahku.name: Sekolahku
sekolahku.description: Data and information on schools and education.

weather-and-climate.name: Weather and Climate
weather-and-climate.description: 10 years of rainfall and temperature data.

name-popularity.name: Baby Name Popularity
name-popularity.description: Explore the popularity and trends of baby names.

birthday-explorer.name: Birthday Popularity
birthday-explorer.description: Data-driven insights into your date of birth!

refugee-situation.name: Malaysia's Refugee Situation
refugee-situation.description: Get an overview of the refugee situation in Malaysia, including demographics, challenges, and UNHCR's efforts to provide assistance and protection.

orang-asli.name: The Indigenous Peoples
orang-asli.description: Insights on Peninsular Malaysia's original inhabitants.

covid-vaccination.name: COVID-19 Vaccination
covid-vaccination.description: Daily COVID-19 vaccination activity by dose type and age group, including vaccination coverage rates across the country.

ktmb-explorer.name: KTMB Explorer
ktmb-explorer.description: Explore ridership by service, origins and destination.

rapid-explorer.name: Rapid Rail Explorer
rapid-explorer.description: Explore ridership by service, origins and destination.

rapid-bus-rail.name: Rapid Rail Explorer
rapid-bus-rail.description: Explore ridership by service, origins and destination.

healthcare-facilities.name: Healthcare Facilities
healthcare-facilities.description: The Health Informatics Centre (PIK) maintains a constantly-updated database on all healthcare facilities in Malaysia.

covidnow-data.name: Data on COVIDNOW
covidnow-data.description: Discover important data about the internet usage habits of Malaysians when browsing COVIDNOW

labour-market.name: Labour Markets
labour-market.description: Monthly Labour Force Survey (LFS) report, covering unemployment, labour force participation, and nature of employment.

composite-index.name: Composite Indices
composite-index.description: Leading, coincident, and lagging indicators for the Malaysian economy.

wholesale-retail.name: Wholesale & Retail Trade
wholesale-retail.description: Monthly wholesale and retail trade performance, including the performance of motor vehicle sales.

industrial-production.name: Industrial Production
industrial-production.description: Monthly industrial production performance, covering mining, manufacturing, and electricity production.

producer-prices.name: Producer Prices
producer-prices.description: Monthly PPI inflation, covering producer prices for all main economic sectors except services and construction.

kawasanku.name: Kawasanku
kawasanku.description: Census 2020 data at national, state, district, parliament, and state legislative assembly (DUN) level.

iip.name: International Investment Position (IIP)
iip.description: Quarterly statement of Malaysia's external financial assets and liabilities; the IIP shows stocks while the BOP shows flows.

bop.name: Balance of Payments
bop.description: Quarterly statement of Malaysia's transactions with other nations; the BOP shows flows while the IIP shows stocks.

manufacturing-statistics.name: Manufacturing Statistics
manufacturing-statistics.description: Monthly performance of manufacturing subsectors, covering sales, employment, and wages.

labour-productivity.name: Labour Productivity
labour-productivity.description: Quarterly labour productivity across all key economic sectors, covering time-based and worker-based productivity.

formal-sector-wages.name: Formal Sector Wages
formal-sector-wages.description: Quarterly formal sector wages at national and state level, based on administrative data from EPF and SOCSO

services-statistics.name: Services Statistics
services-statistics.description: Quarterly performance of services sub-sectors, covering sales, employment, and wages.

services-producer-prices.name: Services Producer Prices
services-producer-prices.description: Quarterly producer prices in the services sector, complementing the PPI which does not cover the services sector.

construction-statistics.name: Construction Statistics
construction-statistics.description: Quarterly surveillance of construction projects in the public and private sectors.

household-income-expenditure.name: Household Income & Expenditure
household-income-expenditure.description: Household income and expenditure at state and district level, updated with the latest data from the 2022 survey.

population.name: Population of Malaysia
population.description: The population of Malaysia from 1980 to the present, including vital statistics on births and deaths.

external-trade.name: External Trade Statistics
external-trade.description: Monthly external trade statistics and indices, covering exports, imports, the trade balance, and terms of trade.

household-debt.name: Household Debt
household-debt.description: This dashboard gives you insight into key trends on household debt.

electronic-payments.name: Electronic Payments
electronic-payments.description: This dashboard gives you an overview of the electronic payment trends available in Malaysia.

business-creation-destruction.name: Business Creation and Destruction
business-creation-destruction.description: Powered by their registry, this dashboard summarises trends in business creation and destruction.

life-expectancy.name: Life Expectancy
life-expectancy.description: This dashboard summarises trends in life expectancy since 1957, with breakdowns by state and demographic group.

wellbeing.name: Well-Being
wellbeing.description: The annual Malaysian Well-being Index (MyWI) Report is published to measure the well-being of Malaysians from an economic and social perspective.

padu-tracker.name: Pangkalan Data Utama (PADU)
padu-tracker.description: The first integrated database in Malaysian history

digital-economy.name: Digital Economy
digital-economy.description: Performance of e-commerce and the ICT sector, as well as businesses' and households' usage of ICT tools.
